statements.statement: CALL db.index.fulltext.queryNodes('work', 'darkness') YIELD node as work, score RETURN work.label, score, work.pagerank, sqrt(work.pagerank * score) as calc ORDER BY calc descending
CALL db.index.fulltext.queryNodes('work', 'darkness visible') YIELD node as work, score RETURN work.label, score, work.pagerank, sqrt(work.pagerank * score) as calc ORDER BY calc descending
CALL db.index.fulltext.queryNodes('work', 'darkness golding') YIELD node as work, score RETURN work.label, score, work.pagerank, sqrt(work.pagerank * score) as calc ORDER BY calc descending

CALL db.index.fulltext.queryNodes('work', 'darkness visible william golding') YIELD node as work, score RETURN work.label, score, work.pagerank, sqrt(work.pagerank * score) as calc ORDER BY calc descending
CALL db.index.fulltext.queryNodes('work', 'darkness golding novel') YIELD node as work, score RETURN work.label, score, work.pagerank, sqrt(work.pagerank * score) as calc ORDER BY calc descending

CALL db.index.fulltext.queryNodes('work', 'darkness visible william golding novel') YIELD node as work, score RETURN work.label, score, work.pagerank, sqrt(work.pagerank * score) as calc ORDER BY calc descending
